data.title: Possible Bug (playtest 20131130): Beach Tiles missing in map editor

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body:
Hi, 

it seems that some beach tiles are missing in the map editor in the **playtest 20131130**.

e.g. there is no way to mimic the coastline with the tiles in the screenshot. 

![screen](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1154361/1694096/d7de73e8-5e9a-11e3-8f6a-13ec185135e5.png)

This applies to the temperate and desert tilesets. I have not checked the others.

data.title: Ship SDL 2 on all platforms
data.body: http://libsdl.org/download-1.2.php is now legacy. We still retain compatibility for it, but prefer SDL 2 since #4038.

data.title: Enforce a non-destructible bridge in Nod01
data.body: to be able to complete the mission at all costs. #4230 Funny thing is: similiar issues happened before #2855

data.title: Made the FPS settings fool proof
data.body: #4221 so I never break them again ;)

data.title: Disallow Spice grow overlaps on cliffs
data.body:
![spice-cliff-glitches](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/756669/1691183/90e23a3a-5e5c-11e3-9f39-070e271c3d70.png)

arrakis.yaml needs some tweaking.

data.title: Update CHANGELOG for recent ra oil derrick change
Polish D2K spice rendering.
Added the Select All units on screen hotkey
data.body: #4182 also showcases that we can have modifier + key here.

data.title: Move to a managed Lua implementation
data.body:
Fixes the current disposal crash on OSX and sidesteps a potential AccessViolationException crash on Windows when using the native Lua.
The Lua dlls are again custom with dangerous bits supposedly disabled by me, similar to what we have now with MonoboxedLua. See me/KopiLua and me/NLua for my forks with the edits.
Has some Lua code refactoring as an added bonus.
Closes #4170 and #4204

data.title: Added a new Launch.Replay=$FILEPATH parameter
data.body: for OpenRA.Game.exe to instantly start watching a *.rep file. Use cases are automated testing and double-clicking .rep files in the future.

data.title: Allow map.yaml checks with OpenRA.Lint.exe
Editor has to add RequiresMod to map.yaml
data.body: providing correct work of #4234 and #4235

data.title: Don't crash map preview when loading a map with bogus tileset
data.body:
#3033

The `Map.RequiresMod` check needs @ihptru to update all maps on http://content.open-ra.org so it is disabled for now.

data.title: Added a minimap renderer to OpenRA.Utility.exe
data.body:
#4195 for http://content.open-ra.org/ which should migrate to this tool. The indexed PNGs generated with it are 10x smaller than the uncompressed BMPs created by https://github.com/Holloweye/OpenRA-Content-Website/blob/master/python/minimap.py It should also fix wrong radar colors for the ARRAKIS tileset etc.

We also want to fade out the OpenRA.Editor.exe #3377.

data.title: Enabled a Timestep controller for replays and only there
data.body: We discussed https://github.com/cerebrum/dr/blob/master/games-strategy/openra/files/README.gentoo in IRC and @Cerebrum advises people to change `Game.Timestep` to fast-forward replays. This is a good use-case, but fatal for network play if people forget to reset it to 40 which will cause jittering. I added the GUI speed slider derived from experiments #2058 here and removed Timestep from `settings.yaml` to make sure it will never break.

data.title: ? does not work in Lobby Chat

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body: Every other special char even those with more complex modifiers works so this is strange. SDL 1.2 & de_DE keyboard

data.title: Made visceroids feel at home in Tiberium
Bug in first nod mission

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body: The player's units in openra's version of the first tiberium dawn nod mission will somehow consider the bridge to nikoomba's village an enemy. They attack it even when not ordered to and will often destroy it, making the village inaccessible and therefore the mission impossible to complete.

data.title: Shared MOTD between all mods and a default motd.txt
data.body: to self-document how it works. I noticed that dedicated server admins like @xaionaro have one MOTD that is shared between all instances and contains no mod specific information. I also dislike underscores in filenames.

data.title: Moved Pak.cs to the correct directory
data.body: I get a file not found on Linux which breaks compilation in MonoDevelop.

data.title: MaxMind GeoLite2 support
data.body: Port to https://github.com/maxmind/GeoIP2-dotnet after the beta ends (2.0.0 release) to support the new http://dev.maxmind.com/geoip/geoip2/geolite2/ at country level.

data.title: Easy to understand exception messages for all YAML problems
data.body:
most of the time I can tell what the exception log is telling me, ie "there aren't any frames there" for something I mussed up in the sequences, or "this file isn't there" for an shp I forgot to convert to the proper format

but there are so many exception logs that just say something like 
"Value cannot be null."  that I can't figure out and I need to go into the chat, or look through everything I've changed since I last tested the game

so it would be nice to have a couple lines at the top or bottom of the exception log that say "check your prerequisites in the structures.yaml under the item FSAL" or something like that
- [x] #4225 
- [x] #3568

data.title: Exception log to be translated #1, prerequisite null

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body:
http://pastebin.com/ShViGjYs

this exception occurs when someone forgets to include text under the "ProvidesCustomPrerequisite" line, like this:

```
ProvidesCustomPrerequisite:
    Prerequisite:
```

and can be fixed by doing this:

```
ProvidesCustomPrerequisite:
    Prerequisite: something
```

data.title: Add back the smudge that was missing in allies-02-classic
Start with a construction yard on the D2K Brimstone map.
data.body:
Having the match start with your mcv trapped in a walled area has always bugged me.
Players now start with a construction yard instead.

data.title: Accidentily setting MaxFramerate: 0 in the settings GUI breaks everything apart

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body:
```
Exception of type `System.OverflowException`: Outside range [MinValue,MaxValue]
  at System.TimeSpan.From (Double value, Int64 tickMultiplicator) [0x0005e] in mono-3.2.3/mcs/class/corlib/System/TimeSpan.cs:306 
  at System.TimeSpan.FromSeconds (Double value) [0x00000] in mono-3.2.3/mcs/class/corlib/System/TimeSpan.cs:292 
  at OpenRA.Game.Run () [0x0005f] in OpenRA.Game/Game.cs:434 
  at OpenRA.Program.Run (System.String[] args) [0x00011] in OpenRA.Game/Support/Program.cs:114 
  at OpenRA.Program.Main (System.String[] args) [0x0005a] in OpenRA.Game/Support/Program.cs:38
```

```
[21:00] <chrisf> actually, we should be validating that
[21:00] <chrisf> or converting 0 => disabled
```
